alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 3:02PM MST until December 20 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills of 20 to 30 degrees below zero expected. * WHERE...Moscow, Uniontown, Colfax, Pullman, Oakesdale, Genesee, Tekoa, Plummer, La Crosse, Potlatch, and Rosalia. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 7 PM Wednesday to Noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
